com.beyondspock.control

Class BeyondSpockController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beyondspock.control.BeyondSpockController

  • public class BeyondSpockController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Fabio Riberto BeyondSpockController class is in charge to route the requests to the proper service controller.

      • bidService

        public void bidService(int itemId,
                       int bid,
                       java.lang.String sessionKey)
                throws InvalidSessionException
        Bid service: Check that the session is valid. Case session is valid then call BidController.storeABid() method to try to insert new bid for a particular item
        Parameters:
        itemId -
        bid -
        sessionKey -
        Throws:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • loginService

        Parameters:

        Returns:
